open

public static ModuleConnection open(java.lang.String connectString)
                             throws ModuleIOException,
                                    UnknownConnectionTypeException
Open a connection given a string such as "serial:COM4" that specifies a protocol and a location such as a port name or IP address. The connection must be closed using the close() method when it is no longer needed.

Throws:
ModuleIOException
UnknownConnectionTypeException
